title: Mario: The Philippines
creator_credit: Soerabaia Pictures and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Study of Mario, a Filipino boy aged about eight years how has left school and works to help with the family income. Notes the life style of the people, the market, the role of the children and a causeway built for the locals by Australian engineers.
creator_credit_for_label: Soerabaia Pictures and South Australian Film Corporation
